hooks.prompt: This workspace follows the dot-ai convention. Execute the boot sequence: (1) find root .ai/, (2) load AGENTS.md → SOUL.md → USER.md → IDENTITY.md → TOOLS.md, (3) load memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md for today and yesterday, (4) scan for projects and build workspace overview. Follow model-routing rules for all sub-agent spawns.
Before starting: check model-routing rules. Use haiku for execution/extraction tasks, sonnet for development/research, opus ONLY for complex reasoning. Never use the default model without checking.
